title: Evaluate the Poorly Written Code
context: Review the poorly written JavaScript function below and identify the best improvement that could be made to adhere to modern best practices.

parts.question: Which of the following changes would most improve the `process_data` function?
options: Use `results.push(...)` instead of `results[results.length] = ...` for adding elements to the array to improve readability.
Add curly braces to `if` statements to enhance readability and maintainability.

parts.question: What improvement can be made to the loop structure to make it more modern and readable?
options: Replace the for-loop with a for-of loop.
Convert the for-loop into a while-loop to enhance performance.
Use a forEach method to iterate over the array.
Implement the loop with recursion for better performance.
parts.expected: Replace the for-loop with a for-of loop.
